name: TravelTrac
overview:
TravelTrac is dedicated to developing and marketing leisure and adventure travel & trip sharing venues. By integrating existing web technologies and progressive remote access features, we strive to enable friends, family, and like-minded enthusiasts to share their global adventures in virtual real-time via media rich web content.

TravelTrac’s Sailtrac, TrekTrac, and MotoTrac domains offer FREE services where any user can create their own custom expedition style web pages and share their adventure travels in virtual real time via the web. More robust than a blog, Traveltrac domains integrate custom features and state of the art technologies that permit a user’s to stay connected to friends, family, and like minded enthusiasts while on their journey. Remote access features permit the addition of content even when direct internet access in unavailable from any wireless device or data plan enabled cell phone. Uploading GPS position reports, integrating custom maps, adding or editing text journal entries, photos (with geotagging), and even video is simple, quick, and easy — even remotely!
